title: WTT: EPDG Bob Spade for a different EPDG
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: WTT: EPDG Bob Spade for a different EPDG
posts.post_content:
Would anyone want to trade for this SGC 1.5 Bob Spade with an EPDG back? I’m specifically looking for one of the following in return, but would entertain any EPDG I don’t have. What I am really in search of though: 

Harry Gasper EPDG
Dick Hoblitzell EPDG
Mickey Doolin EPDG
Red Dooin EPDG
Jack Barry: Tolstoi 

Raw/slabbed doesn’t matter to me. Let’s make a deal. Thanks in advance. 

Chris

Bumping and updating. Would love to trade this Bob Spade. Open to any EPDG, AB, Cycle, or Tolstoi I don't have. Or perhaps multiple easier backs. If you are interested in the Spade, feel free to reach out. 

Chris
